query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Godi, Fiorenza, poi che se’ sì grande 2 che per mare e per terra batti l’ali, 3 e per lo ’nferno tuo nome si spande!
query.error: **English:** 1 Rejoice, Florence, since you are so great 2 that you beat your wings over sea and land, 3 and your name spreads even through hell!
query.result: 1 Nandasi, Fiorentina, yatas tvam asi tathā mahān 2 yaḥ samudre ca sthale ca patasi pakṣau, 3 evaṃ ca narake tava nāma vistarati!

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 Tra li ladron trovai cinque cotali 5 tuoi cittadini onde mi ven vergogna, 6 e tu in grande orranza non ne sali.
query.error: **English:** 4 Among the thieves I found five such 5 of your citizens that I am ashamed of it, 6 and you do not emerge from it with great fear.
query.result: 4 Cauraiḥ saha pañca tādṛśān apaśyam 5 tava nagarījāḥ yataḥ me lajjā jāyate, 6 na ca tvam bhayāt tataḥ na niskrāmasi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 Ma se presso al mattin del ver si sogna, 8 tu sentirai, di qua da picciol tempo, 9 di quel che Prato, non ch’altri, t’agogna.
query.error: **English:** 7 But if at the morning of truth one dreams, 8 you will hear, from now in a short time, 9 of what Prato, and no other, yearns for you.
query.result: 7 Api tu prātaḥsatyasya svapne, 8 śṛṇoṣi, atra kalpād alpa-kālam, 9 yat Prato, na tu anyaḥ, icchati tubhyam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 E se già fosse, non saria per tempo. 11 Così foss’ ei, da che pur esser dee! 12 ché più mi graverà, com’ più m’attempo.
query.error: **English:** 10 And even if it were already, it would not be in time. 11 If only it were, since it must be! 12 For it will weigh on me more, the older I get.
query.result: 10 Api ca yadi syāt, na syāt kālena. 11 Tathāstu, yataḥ tad eva bhavitavyam! 12 Yataḥ yathāham vṛddho bhaviṣyāmi, tathā tad adhikam eva māṃ pidayitum arhasyati.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
13 Noi ci partimmo, e su per le scalee 14 che n’avea fatto iborni a scender pria, 15 rimontò ’l duca mio e trasse mee;
query.error: **English:** 13 We departed, and up the stairs 14 which the blind man had made before for his descent, 15 my leader climbed again and drew me up;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
16 e proseguendo la solinga via, 17 tra le schegge e tra ’ rocchi de lo scoglio 18 lo piè sanza la man non si spedia.
query.error: **English:** 16 and continuing along the solitary way, 17 among the splinters and the rocks of the cliff, 18 the foot without the hand could not advance.
query.result: 16 ca anusaṃcaran ekākinīmārgaṃ, 17 śreṇīnāṃ madhye, ca prastaraśilānāṃ parvatasya, 18 pādaḥ vinā hastaṃ na prayāti sma.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
19 Allor mi dolsi, e ora mi ridoglio 20 quando drizzo la mente a ciò ch’io vidi, 21 e più lo ’ngegno affreno ch’i’ non soglio,
query.error: **English:** 19 Then I grieved, and now I grieve again 20 when I turn my mind to what I saw, 21 and I restrain my intellect more than is my wont,
query.result: 19 Tatra śocāmi, adhunāpi ca punar viṣṇuye 20 Yada manaḥ samādhāya paśyāmi yat tad adṛkṣam, 21 Atiśayena ca buddhim nigrahaṇe yatnena vartāmi,

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
22 perché non corra che virtù nol guidi; 23 sì che, se stella bona o miglior cosa 24 m’ha dato ’l ben, ch’io stessi nol m’invidi.
query.error: **English:** 22 so that it may not run where virtue does not guide it; 23 so that, if a good star or a better thing 24 has given me the good fortune that I should not envy myself.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.error: **English:** 43 I stood upon the bridge to watch the surge, 44 so that if I had not seized a branch, 45 I would have fallen down without being pushed.
query.result: 43 Aham sthitaḥ āsmi setuḥ upari dṛṣṭum udgatam, 44 yathā ced aham na gṛhṇīyām śākhām api, 45 patitaḥ syām adhaḥ vinā abhighātena.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
